source: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri
reference: 民权团体针对密苏里州发出旅行警告

source: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People has put out an alert for people of color traveling to Missouri because of the state's discriminatory policies and racist attacks.
reference: 由于密苏里州的歧视性政策和种族主义袭击，美国有色人种促进协会 (NAACP) 向准备前往密苏里州出游的有色人群发出旅行警告。

source: "You have violations of civil rights that are happening to people.
reference: 侵犯公民权利的行为正发生在人们身上。

source: They're being pulled over because of their skin color, they're being beaten up or killed," the president of the Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, told The Kansas City Star.
reference: 他们因肤色被停车盘问，被殴打或被杀害，”密苏里州 NAACP 主席罗德·查培尔告诉堪萨斯城星报 (The Kansas City Star)。

source: It is the first such warning that the organization has issued for a state in the US.
reference: 这是该组织在美国针对某个州发布的第一个此类警告。

source: The group cited incidents such as racial slurs against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, 28, a black man from Tennessee.
reference: 该组织援引了密苏里大学对黑人学生的种族诽谤以及 28 岁田纳西州黑人男性托利·桑德斯的死亡事件。

source: Sanders died under questionable circumstances earlier this year after he ran out of gas while traveling through the state, and was taken into custody by Missouri police without being accused of a crime.
reference: 今年早些时候，桑德斯在可疑情况下死亡。他在密苏里州旅行时燃油耗尽，被密苏里州警方在无指控犯罪的情况下拘留。

source: The advisory also points to a recent report by the Missouri Attorney General's Office showing that black drivers in the state were 75 percent more likely to be pulled over than whites.
reference: 咨询中还指出，密苏里州总检察长办公室最近的一份报告显示，“与白人相比，该州的黑人司机被停车盘查的可能性要高出 75%”。

source: "The advisory is for people to be aware, and warn their families and friends and co-workers of what could happen in Missouri," Chapel said.
reference: 查培尔说：“该份咨询是为了提高人们的意识，警告他们的家人、朋友和同事在密苏里州可能发生的情况。”

source: Missouri recorded 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI's hate crime reporting program, ranking the state at 16th in the country in terms of the number of such violations.
reference: 根据联邦调查局仇恨犯罪报告计划的最新数据，密苏里州在 2015 年记录了 100 起仇恨罪行；根据罪行量，该州在全国排名第 16 位。

source: The travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that would make it more difficult to sue a business for housing or employment discrimination.
reference: 旅行警告也是对密苏里州新法律的回应，该法律将使起诉住房或就业歧视企业变得更加困难。

source: Lupekscu, the current Chief Technology Officer of UEFA, made a technical report on the 2016 UEFA Euro and the last season of European Champions League at the meeting.
reference: 现任欧足联首席技术官的卢佩斯库在本次大会上做了一份关于2016年欧锦赛以及上赛季欧冠联赛的技术报告。

source: According to a report on the BBC website on January 16, the German expatriate Clemens Sage said: 'If I can succeed there, I can succeed anywhere.' He quoted a song written by singer Frank Sinatra to praise New York City.
reference: 据英国广播公司网站1月16日报道，德国侨民克莱门斯·塞希说：“如果我能在那儿成功，我以后在任何地方都能成功。”他引用的是歌手弗兰克·西纳特拉歌颂纽约市的歌词。

source: Simon Norton, who originates from England had been living in Beijing in recent years, published an article on personal blog site 4Corners7Seas saying: “People generally have a feeling of being at the center of something grand. Although this feeling is hard to describe clearly, it is the reason why so many foreigners stay there for a long time. They want to see what it will become and hope to witness it. ”
reference: 老家位于英格兰、但最近生活在北京的西蒙·诺顿在个人博客网站4Corners7Seas上发表文章说：“人们总体上有一种处于某种宏大事物中心的感觉，这种感觉很难说清楚，但它让许多外国人长久留在那里。他们想看看它会变成什么样，并且希望亲眼见证。”

source: Andy Peñafuerte, who originates from Manila and is currently the deputy editor-in-chief of the website Beijing Children, said: "Beijing is rapidly transforming into a cashless society. The Internet integrates the functions of traditional wallets into smart phones, making it easier for everyone to conduct various transactions."
reference: 来自马尼拉、目前在“北京儿童”网站担任副总编的安迪·佩尼亚富埃尔特说：“北京正在迅速转变为一个无现金社会，互联网把传统钱包的功能整合到智能手机上，使每个人都能更容易地进行许多交易。”

source: The easiest way to overcome problem is to learn a little bit of Mandarin – something easier than one might think.
reference: 克服这一点最简单的办法就是学习一点普通话——这比人们可能想象的要简单。

source: The report believed that the hindrance to growth in human capital as a result of aging has become increasingly apparent. This was particularly the case in the Northeast, where the annual average contribution of aging to human capital growth was -1.28%.
reference: 报告认为，老龄化对人力资本增长的阻碍作用日益明显，尤其在东北地区，老龄化对人力资本增长的年均贡献率为-1.28%。

source: Pan Gongsheng said that the present of risk of cross-border capital flows can be controlled. The fundamental factors underpinning international balance of payments will still exist over the longer term.
reference: 潘功胜指出，目前跨境资本流动风险可控，支撑国际收支平衡的根本性因素仍然长期存在。

source: China News Service Beijing December 17 wire (Reporter: Gao Kai) Heritage makes the world resplendent - The opening ceremony of the 2016 International Summit for the Authentication, Restoration and Protection of Ancient Chinese Calligraphy and Painting was held at Renmin University of China on December 17.
reference: 中新网北京12月17日电 (记者 高凯)世界因遗产而璀璨——2016中国古书画鉴定修复与保护国际高峰论坛于12月17日在中国人民大学开幕。

source: Google also faced EU investigations over giving prominent placement to its own shopping services in search results.
reference: 谷歌还因为在搜索结果中偏向自家购物服务而面临欧盟的调查。

source: Understand through a picture: Bitcoin's legal status around the world
reference: 一张图看懂：比特币在世界各地的法律地位

source: Abstract: A part from the price correction which is natural in speculation, the current round of digital currency tumble has also to do with the 'sworn enemy'—regulation.
reference: 摘要：除了投机属性天然引发的价格回调，本轮数字货币惨跌也与“宿敌”——监管风险不无关系。

source: *This article is taken from Wallstreetcn (WeChat ID: wallstreetcn), editor Wang Mu. For more exciting information, visit wallstreetcn.com or download the Wallstreetcn APP. *
reference: *本文来自华尔街见闻（微信ID：wallstreetcn），编辑王穆。更多精彩资讯请登陆wallstreetcn.com，或下载华尔街见闻APP。*

source: As the authorities in major markets of Bitcoin -- such as China, South Korea and the European Union -- take decisive regulatory measures, the digital currency market dominated by Bitcoin has experienced major bloodshed this week. The price of Bitcoin has fallen below 10,000 dollar, recording the biggest one-day drop.
reference: 随着中国、韩国和欧盟等比特币主要市场的监管风暴迭起，以比特币为首的全球数字货币本周以来惨遭血洗，比特币价格周二起跌破1万美元心理整数位，并创三年以来最大单日跌幅。

source: A part from the price correction which is natural in speculation, the current round of digital currency tumble has also to do with the 'sworn enemy'—regulation.
reference: 除了投机属性天然引发的价格回调，本轮数字货币惨跌也与一直以来的“宿敌”——监管风险不无关系。

source: At this important juncture, HowMuch.net, a visualization big data website, produced a map showing the legitimacy of Bitcoin and regulation measure in place in countries around the world.
reference: 在这个重要的关口，可视化大数据网站HowMuch.net制作了一份图谱，展现比特币在全球各国的合法性地位和受监管程度。

source: The article points out that from the distribution of non-green color patches in the graph, it can be seen that the oriental countries in the traditional sense are more conservative towards Bitcoin than the West.
reference: 文章指出，从图中非绿色的色块分布可以看出，传统意义上的东方国家对比特币的态度比西方更为保守。

source: North America and Western Europe are the regions that have highest level of tolerance to Bitcoin i.e. where green patches are concentrated.
reference: 北美和西欧是对比特币接受程度最高的地区，即绿色块的分布更为集中。

source: The views of the countries in the Middle East and Latin America on Bitcoin are clearly divided, so, the distribution of color patches in these areas is more mixed.
reference: 中东和拉丁美洲各国对比特币的看法呈现明显分化，上述地区的色块分布更为混杂。

source: Although Bitcoin’s popularity has grown exponentially since last year, it does not necessarily mean that all countries are interested in it. It's probably that some countries are concerned that the local currency may be undermined by digital currencies or that digital currencies are used by criminal organizations.
reference: 尽管比特币的“人气”自去年以来呈指数级增长，并不代表所有国家都感兴趣，可能有些国家担心当地法币因此受到威胁，或更担心数字货币被犯罪组织利用。

source: Wallstreetcn Editor's selection: Reading News | 2018: Global Central Banks Are Ushering Digital Currency? One article points out that 2018 is destined to be the first year of digital currency for central banks across the world, viewing from the perspectives of supervision, acceptance/criticism and adoption.
reference: 华尔街见闻主编精选《读要闻|2018：全球央妈开启数字货币元年？》曾提到，从监管、接受/批判、采纳的任一角度来看，2018年都将成为全球央行的数字货币元年。

source: The act of questioning the legal status of Bitcoin by big countries such as Russia is actually meant to make way for the official issuance of digital currencies.
reference: 俄罗斯等大国批评比特币合法性地位的做法，其实也是为了给官方发行数字货币让路。

source: On January 8th, the Barcelona new aid Philippe Coutinho showed up for the first time in Camp Nou with his Barcelona shirt, the Xinhua News Agency reported in Madrid by reporter Xie Yuzhi.
reference: 新华社马德里1月8日电（报道员谢宇智）巴塞罗那新援库蒂尼奥8日在诺坎普首次身披巴萨球衣亮相。

source: Coutinho passed a physical examination of Barcelona early that morning and signed with Barcelona president Bartomeu a contract that will expire in the summer of 2023.
reference: 库蒂尼奥当日上午通过了巴萨的体检，并与巴萨主席巴托梅乌在一份将于2023年夏天到期的合同上签了字。

source: Then he appeared in the face of nearly 7,000 Camp Nou fans as a Barcelona player.
reference: 随后他作为巴萨球员，在诺坎普近7000名球迷面前亮相。

source: As Coutinho is still injured at the moment, he still need recuperate for nearly 20 days before ushering in his debut in the Barcelona shirt.
reference: 由于眼下库蒂尼奥仍有伤在身，他还需休整近20日才能迎来自己身披巴萨球衣的处子秀。

source: Is nothing sacred?
reference: 还有什么神圣的东西？

source: Now Trump's White House is targeting the Statue of Liberty
reference: 现在特朗普的白宫正在瞄准自由女神像

source: Americans appreciate this as well as anyone - hence the carefully stage-manged toppling of Saddam Hussein in Firdos square in Baghdad in 2003.
reference: 美国人和任何人一样都赞同这一点。 因此，2003 年巴格达天堂广场的萨达姆?侯赛因被精心策划地推倒了。

source: Stephen Miller, one of the key ideologues of the Trump regime, surely knew what he was doing when he took a symbolic axe to the Statue of Liberty in a heated argument with CNN's Jim Acosta over the president's proposals to drastically limit legal immigration.
reference: 斯蒂芬?米勒 (Stephen Miller) 作为特朗普政府的关键智囊之一，在与美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 的吉姆?阿科斯塔 (Jim Acosta) 就总统关于严格限制合法移民的提议进行激烈争论时,他肯定知道自己对自由女神像砍出象征性的一斧会发生什么事情。

source: In fairness, Miller did not attack the statue itself.
reference: 公平地说，米勒并没有攻击雕像本身。

source: The poem that you're referring to, that was added later and is not part of the original Statue of Liberty."
reference: 你所指的那首诗，那是后来又加上去的，不是原始自由女神像的一部分。”

source: Miller is factually correct, but as he put it himself, this is not really about history.
reference: 事实上，米勒是正确的，但是正如他自己所说的，这不是真正关于历史。

source: It is about the contemporary resonance of Lazarus's startling words, the only ones in which a state has appeared to invite not just any old immigrants, but the poorest of the poor: "Your tired, your poor, / Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, / The wretched refuse of your teeming shore."
reference: 这涉及到拉撒路惊世之语的现代回音，唯一一个国家似乎不仅邀请任何老移民，而且还邀请穷人中最贫穷的人：“你的疲惫、你的穷困、或者你的挤作一团的民众渴望自由呼吸，/苦难的人拒绝你拥挤的海滩。”

source: The sculpture was intended to mark the connections between French and American republicanism by representing in a well-worn classical trope, the female embodiment of Liberty.
reference: 该雕塑的目的是通过作为自由女神的女性化身的、古老的经典比喻来表达法国和美国共和主义之间的联系。

source: The marrying of the poem to the image is a brilliant feminist coup and a devastating attack on American nativism.
reference: 这首诗与这幅画的结合是一场成功的女权主义政变,并且是对美国本土主义的毁灭性打击。

source: And just as Lazarus changed the meaning of the statue, rightwingers have long wanted to change it back.
reference: 就像拉撒路改变雕像的意义一样，右翼者一直想要把它改回原意。

source: The torch is not to light the way to the United States."
reference: 火炬不是照亮美国的道路。”

source: Rather unusually, Limbaugh actually hit on something.
reference: 不同寻常的是，林博实际上被一些东西所打动。

source: The meaning of the statue is entirely a matter of the angle of perception.
reference: 雕像的意义完全取决于认知的角度。

source: Lazarus's great imaginative act was to see it as it would be seen by exhausted, wretched but hopeful people on the decks of ships after long and often dreadful journeys.
reference: 拉撒路极富想象力的做法就是能够看到它。当疲惫的，可怜的但充满希望的人会在经过漫长而往往可怕的旅程后，可以在船甲板上看到它。

source: And of course, this is not the perspective Miller and Trump want ever to recognise.
reference: 当然，这不是米勒和特朗普曾想要承认的观点。

source: Their torch is meant not to light the way, but to inflame the hatreds that are their only source of power.
reference: 他们火炬不是为了照亮道路，而是为了点燃他们唯一力量来源的仇恨。

source: Eilidh Doyle recalls a time when only two Scots made the GB team
reference: 艾里德?多伊尔 (Eilidh Doyle) 回忆起当时英国国家队只有两名苏格兰人。

source: "I speak to people in the Scottish Institute of Sport and they think it's something to do with what they've done.
reference: “我找苏格兰体育学院的的人员谈话。他们认为这与他们的作为有关。

source: Scottish Athletics think it's something to do with what they've done.
reference: 苏格兰田径运动员认为这与他们的作为有关。

source: British athletics: it's something to do with what they've done.
reference: 英国田径协会认为这与他们的作为有关。

source: Whatever the combination of circumstances, it's absolutely brilliant."
reference: 无论情况如何，这都是极其辉煌的。“

source: "Eilidh is slightly modest.
reference: “艾里德有点谦虚。

source: Her captain's speech was incredible," says Black.
reference: 她的队长演讲真是令人难以置信 ”，布莱克说道。

source: The passion and real feeling that Eilidh naturally put into it were great."
reference: 艾里德自然投入的激情和真感情很不错。”

source: The Commonwealth silver medallist, who will compete in the 400m hurdles at her fifth World Championships, says it's "incredible" 16 Scots are in the British team.
reference: 这名将在其第五次世锦赛中参加 400 米跨栏比赛的英联邦银牌得主表示，英国国家队中有 16 名苏格兰人，这是“令不可思议的”。

source: Middle-distance runner Muir is leading the way, having set five British and two European records in the past year.
reference: 中跑选手缪尔是领军人物。在过去一年中创她下了五项英国记录和两项欧洲纪录。

source: She will go in the 1500m and the 5,000m.
reference: 她将参加 1500 米和 5000 米项目比赛。

source: Chris O'Hare, who runs in the 1500m, is another Scot to watch, following a great season that included victory at the British Team trials and the Anniversary Games.
reference: 参加 1500 米项目比赛的克里斯?奥黑尔则是另一位值得关注的苏格兰选手，之前，她在赛季取得了很好的成绩，分别在英国国家对预选赛和奥运周年赛中获胜。

source: Doyle remembers her first world championships, when the only other Scot in the team was Lee McConnell.
reference: 多伊尔回想起她参加第一次世界锦标赛，当时队里唯一的另一名苏格兰人是李?麦康奈尔 (Lee McConnell) 。

source: It just shows how far we've come.
reference: 这只是表明我们走了多远。

source: In 2016, Huawei had total staff strength of 180,000, with wages amounting to RMB121.8 billion, up 21% year-on-year.
reference: 2016年华为员工共18万，雇员费用高达1218亿，同比增长了21%。

source: Blocking critics from Facebook: Don't run for public office, if you can't take heat from voters
reference: 在脸书上屏蔽批评者：如果你不能忍受选民的责难，就不要竞选公职

source: He chafed at the criticism, sure.
reference: 他对这些批评很恼火，毫无疑问。

source: Because back in 1783, Washington said, "the freedom of Speech may be taken away - and, dumb & silent we may be led, like sheep, to the Slaughter."
reference: 因为早在 1783 年，华盛顿就说过，“言论自由被剥夺——我们就会像羔羊一样在沉默和愚昧中被宰杀。”

source: That brings me to Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan, who needs to work on being more like Washington.
reference: 这让我想到了马里兰州的州长拉里·霍根，他需要向华盛顿学习。

source: Hogan's staff has blocked and deleted the posts of at least 450 people who voiced their opinions on his official Facebook page.
reference: 霍根的职员屏蔽并删除了至少 450 人的帖子，因为他们在他的脸书官方主页上发表自己的观点。

source: And the American Civil Liberties Union sued him for that earlier this week.
reference: 美国公民自由联盟本周早些时候就此对他提起了诉讼。

source: "It's only Facebook," plenty of folks said.
reference: 很多人说“这只是脸书而已。”

source: But it matters.
reference: 但，这很重要。

source: And it especially matters when it's a guy like Hogan.
reference: 这一点尤其重要，因为面对的是霍根这样的人。

source: He has the second-highest approval rating of the nation's 50 governors.
reference: 在全国 50 位州长中，他得到的好评位列第二。

source: He's also been pretty deft at using Facebook as a primary means to connect with his constituents, playfully debuting his hairless head after chemo treatments on his page.
reference: 他也非常善于将脸书作为和选民联络感情的主要方式，戏谑地在主页上首次展示他化疗后的秃头。

source: The Post talked to some of the real people blocked by Hogan.
reference: 《华盛顿邮报》与被霍根屏蔽的人面对面交谈过。

source: Attorney Lakshmi Sarma Ramani of Bowie, Md., wasn't hateful, but she asked about hate crimes.
reference: 马里兰州鲍伊的大律师拉克希米·萨尔马·拉马尼并没有愤世嫉俗，但是她询问了关于仇恨犯罪的问题。

source: "I politely commented that I was disappointed in his lack of response to hate crimes and other recent news items," she wrote in the comment section of The Post's news story.
reference: 她在《华盛顿邮报》的新闻故事评论部分中写道，“我很礼貌地评论道，我对他没有回复仇恨犯罪和其他最近的新闻事件表示失望。

source: But that's exactly what's happening, only digitally.
reference: 但是那确实是现在正在发生的事，不过是在数字层面上。

source: Hogan isn't the first public official to be criticized for defanging Facebook and other social media.
reference: 霍根不是第一个因在脸书和其他社交媒体上噤声他人而受到指责的公共官员。

source: President Trump is being sued by Twitter users who were blocked from his Twitter feed.
reference: 特朗普总统就正被推特用户起诉，因为他在推特上屏蔽了他们。

source: The chair of the Loudoun County Board of Supervisors violated the First Amendment, according to U.S. District Judge James C. Cacheris in Alexandria, when she banned a constituent from her Facebook page.
reference: 据美国亚历山大市的地区法官詹姆斯·c·卡察里斯称，劳登县监督委员会主席从她的脸书主页屏蔽选民的行为违反了第一修正案。

source: And in Kentucky, Gov. Matt Bevin (R) also got a visit from the ACLU over his use of Facebook and Twitter.
reference: 肯塔基州州长马特·贝文 (R) 也因其对脸书和推特的使用而受到美国公民自由联盟的光顾。

source: This shouldn't be so hard.
reference: 这不应该这么难。

source: The number of newspapers quadrupled between 1776 and 1800, and anonymous letter writers hammered his leadership.
reference: 新闻报纸的数量在 1776 年到 1800 年间翻了四番，还有人写匿名信猛烈批评他的领导。

source: And true leadership means accepting that.
reference: 而真正的领导者需要接受这一点。

source: In May 2017, Jinan issued regulations stating that undergraduates who make social security contributions consecutively for half a year will be entitled to be treated under the same residential property purchase policies as that of local residents with permanent residency.
reference: 2017年5月，济南出台规定，本科生连续缴社保半年，可享有本地常住户口居民同等购房政策；

source: In July, Chengdu issue regulations stating that young talent with overseas university bachelor’s degree or higher academic qualifications may apply to settle in Chengdu based on their graduation certificate.
reference: 7月，成都出台规定，外地大学本科及以上学历的青年人才，凭毕业证即可申请落户成都。

source: Some even believed that this implied that the time has come to abolish residential property “purchase quotas”.
reference: 有人甚至认为，这意味着楼市“限购”取消的时机已到。

source: Ronan Rafferty hopes for home comforts at Renaissance Club
reference: 罗南·拉弗蒂期待在文艺复兴俱乐部享受回家的感觉

source: Former European No 1 Ronan Rafferty will be hoping for home comforts over the next three days as the Renaissance Club in East Lothian hosts the 25th edition of the Scottish Senior Open.
reference: 东洛锡安文艺复兴俱乐部举办第 25 届苏格兰常青公开赛，前欧洲冠军罗南·拉弗蒂将在接下来的三天中享受回家的感觉。

source: The Northern Irishman, who led next door at Archerfield Links heading into the final round last year before losing out to Paul Eales, is attached to the new venue and is acting as tournament ambassador on behalf of the club's founder and CEO Jerry Sarvadi.
reference: 这位北爱尔兰人去年带领隔壁的阿彻菲尔德·林克斯挺进了决赛，但最终输给了保罗·伊尔斯。他现在为该新会场工作，代表俱乐部创始人兼首席执行官杰瑞·萨尔瓦蒂担任赛事大使。

source: "The players will see this course at its finest, it is in fabulous condition.
reference: 运动员们将会看到这个球场的最佳面貌和最佳状态。

source: He's a keen advocate of this game and is proud of his achievement here.
reference: 他是此次比赛的热衷拥护者，也对在这里取得成就感到十分自豪。

source: Englishman Eales is looking forward to defending a championship for the first time despite winning on both the European Tour and European Challenge Tour in his 32-year career.
reference: 英格兰人伊尔斯期待第一次卫冕，尽管在 32 年的职业生涯中，他已同时赢得欧洲巡回赛和欧洲挑战巡回赛。

source: "I didn't get to defend the Extremadura Open because that was taken off the schedule the year after I won it.
reference: 我没有卫冕埃斯特雷马杜拉公开赛，因为在我获胜的第二年，这场比赛就取消了。

source: Coming back to this part of the world is magical.
reference: 来到这个地方感觉很神奇，

source: The memories from last year are coming back and it was special for me and my wife Sharon to win last year.
reference: 去年的回忆一一浮现，对我和我的妻子莎伦来说，去年的获胜对我们有着特殊的意义。

source: Making his return to action on home soil is Gary Orr, who joined the European Senior Tour after turning 50 earlier this year.
reference: 回到故土比赛的是盖瑞·奥尔，他今年早些时候刚满 50 岁，然后还参加了欧洲常青巡回赛。

source: This event will be his first Scottish appearance since the Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open in 2013.
reference: 这次是他自 2013 年苏格兰高尔夫公开赛起第一次参加苏格兰比赛。

source: I'm happy with how it's going so far."
reference: 我很满意目前的状况。”

source: Joining the trio in the field are former Masters winner Ian Woosnam and Senior major champions Paul Broadhurst, Roger Chapman, Mark James and Mark McNulty.
reference: 加入场内三人组的是前大师赛获胜者伊恩·伍斯南和常青大赛冠军保罗·布罗德赫斯特、罗杰·查普曼、马克·詹姆斯和马克?麦纽提。

source: Orr and former Ryder Cup captain Sam Torrance are among six Scots in the field, the others being Andrew Oldcorn, Stephen McAllister, Bill Longmuir and Ross Drummond.
reference: 场上共六位苏格兰运动员，奥尔和前莱德杯队长萨姆·托伦斯是其中之二，另外四位为安德鲁·奥德柯恩、斯蒂芬·麦卡利斯特、比尔·郎缪和罗斯·德拉蒙德。

source: On January 9, A-share “champion” Kweichow Moutai set another new record high, closing at RMB782.52 for the day. Total market capitalization amounted to RMB983 billion, just a stone’s throw from the RMB1 trillion market capitalization mark.
reference: 1月9日，A股“股王”贵州茅台股价再次创出历史新高，截至收盘收于782.52元，总市值达9830亿元，距离万亿市值仅一步之遥。

source: The guidance price of RMB1,499 was RMB200 higher than the previous retail price of RMB1,299.
reference: 1499元的指导价较此前1299元的零售价上涨了200元。

source: This price hike caused Kweichow Moutai shares to soar. A Beijing Morning Post reporter calculated and found that Kweichow Moutai’s share price had increased by RMB95, or more than 14%, over the eight trading days since the company announced its price hike.
reference: 此次提价举动刺激了贵州茅台股价飙涨，北京晨报记者统计发现，贵州茅台提价消息宣布的8个交易日以来，贵州茅台股价上涨了95元，涨幅超过14%。

source: Driven by Moutai, listed baijiu companies began to introduce price hikes and control supply, enjoying the dividend brought about by consumption upgrading.
reference: 在茅台的带动下，白酒类上市公司纷纷开启提价控货节奏，坐享消费升级带来的红利。

source: High-level foreign talent with Chinese green cards who found technology enterprises may enjoy “citizen treatment”.
reference: 持有中国绿卡的外籍高层次人才创办科技型企业，可享受“国民待遇”。

source: The budget target is to contain the price at 15% lower than a Mercedes-Benz S class.
reference: 预算目标是把价格控制在比梅赛德斯-奔驰S级汽车低15%。

source: Russia Lianta network reported on January 16 that from the end of February to the end of March, the key R&D unit for the President’s automobiles - Central Scientific Research Automobile and Automotive Engines Institute (NAMI) - will deliver 15 automobiles to the Federal Protective Service.
reference: 据俄罗斯连塔网1月16日报道，2月底至3月初，总统座驾的主要研发单位——俄罗斯国家汽车工程研究院（NAMI）将向联邦警卫局交付16辆车。

source: It is understood that the engineering and technology team of Germany’s BWM is participating in the R&D of the engine unit.
reference: 据悉，德国保时捷公司的工程技术团队参与了动力装置研发。

source: Elsewhere, according to reports by TASS on January 16, Manturov told reporters that the “motorcade” series of automobiles will be sold externally from 2019. All configured models will be available.
reference: 另据塔斯社1月16日报道，曼图罗夫告诉记者，“车队”系列汽车将从2019年起对外零售，各种配置的车型都能买到。

source: Russia’s Ministry of Trade and Industry plans to increase the annual production of the “motorcade” series of automobiles to more than 1 million after 2020.
reference: 俄罗斯工贸部计划在2020年后把“车队”系列汽车的年产量提高到1000辆以上。

source: Manturov said, “Manufacturing 18 units puts us at full capacity now. This year’s output is more than 70 units, with 200 units next year, and 300 or even more the year after.”
reference: 曼图罗夫说：“我们现在生产18辆就满负荷了，今年的产量是70辆以上，明年达到200辆，后年300辆甚至更多。”

source: (Editor/He Yingjun)
reference: （编译/贺颖骏）

source: Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony of the CPC in Dialogue with World Political Parties High-level Meeting and delivered a keynote speech. Wang Huning attended the first plenary session of the dialogue.
reference: 习近平出席中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会开幕式并发表主旨讲话，王沪宁出席对话会第一次全体会议。

source: Xi Jinping met respectively
reference: 习近平分别会见

source: The 12th National Congress of the Chinese Association for the Advancement of Democracy opened in Beijing. On behalf of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Yang delivered a congratulatory message.
reference: 中国民主促进会第十二次全国代表大会在京开幕，汪洋代表中共中央致贺词。

source: On December 1st, General Secretary of CPC Central Committee and President Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony of the CPC in Dialogue with World Political Parties High-level Meeting at the Great Hall of the People and delivered
reference: 中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平十二月一号在人民大会堂出席中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会开幕式，并发表

source: a keynote speech entitled "Building a Better World Together"
reference: 题为《携手建设更加美好的世界》的主旨讲话

source: to work with all parties to promote the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind.
reference: 愿同各方推动构建人类命运共同体的真诚愿望

source: The future and the destinies of the citizens of every country in the world are increasingly linked.
reference: 世界各国人民前途命运越来越紧密地联系在一起。

source: People of all countries in the world should uphold the concept of one world, understand each other, seek common grounds while reserving differences,
reference: 世界各国人民应该秉持天下一家理念，彼此理解、求同存异

source: and work together to make efforts to build a community with a shared future for mankind.
reference: 共同为构建人类命运共同体而努力

source: I propose the Belt and Road Initiative, that is, to practice the concept of a community with a shared future for mankind.
reference: 我提出一带一路倡议，就是要践行人类命运共同体理念。

source: Xi Jinping stressed that we must strive to build a world free from fear, universally safe, and that upholds a common, integrated, cooperative, and sustainable new conception of security,
reference: 习近平强调，我们要努力建设一个远离恐惧，普遍安全的世界，坚持共同、综合、合作、可持续的新安全观。

source: and allow all civilizations to coexist harmoniously.
reference: 让各种文明和谐共存。

source: We must strive to build a clean and beautiful world with green mountains and clear waters, and adhere to the concept of symbiotic coexistence between man and nature, and jointly create a harmonious and livable
reference: 我们要努力建设一个山清水秀、清洁美丽的世界，坚持人与自然共生共存的理念，共同营造和谐宜居的

source: home for humanity
reference: 人类家园

source: We should build a network of international political parties for exchange and cooperation in various forms and at various levels, and bring together powerful forces to build a community with a shared future for mankind.
reference: 搭建多种形式、多种层次的国际政党交流合作网络，汇聚构建人类命运共同体的强大力量。

source: We need to accomplish our own tasks well, which itself is a contribution to building a community with a shared future for mankind.
reference: 我们要把自己的事情做好，这本身就是对构建人类命运共同体的贡献。

source: First,
reference: 第一

source: and actively participate in the process of political settlement of difficult hot-button international issues.
reference: 主动参与国际热点难点问题的政治解决进程。

source: No matter to what degree China is developed, it will never become a hegemon and or engage in expansionism.
reference: 中国无论发展到什么程度，都永远不称霸，永远不搞扩张。

source: By the middle of this century, China will build a prosperous, strong, democratic, civilized, harmonious, and beautiful socialist modern power.
reference: 到本世纪中叶中国将建成富强民主文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化强国。

source: The Chinese Communist Party has always stressed the importance of establishing a global perspective, actively learning from the achievements of civilization by the people of all countries in the world, and applying the same in the light of China's actual conditions.
reference: 中国共产党历来强调树立世界眼光，积极学习借鉴世界各国人民创造的文明成果，并结合中国实际加以运用。

source: to institutionalize the high-level dialogue between the Chinese Communist Party and global political parties so that they can become a platform for high-level political dialogue with broad representation
reference: 将中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会机制化，使之成为具有广泛代表性和国际影响力的

source: Confucius, an ancient Chinese thinker,
reference: 中国古代思想家孔子

source: said that
reference: 说过

source: For a long time, the CPC has maintained regular contacts with more than 400 political parties and political organizations in more than 160 countries and regions in the world.
reference: 长期以来，中国共产党同世界上一百六十多个国家和地区的四百多个政党和政治组织保持着经常性联系。

source: The CPC in Dialogue with World Political Parties High-level Meeting focuses on the responsibility of building a community of shared future for mankind and jointly building beautiful global political parties. Leaders of nearly 300 political parties and political organizations in over 120 countries, altogether more than 600 Chinese and foreign representatives, attended the meeting.
reference: 中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会以构建人类命运共同体、共同建设美好世界政党的责任为主题，来自一百二多个国家的近三百个政党和政治组织的领导人共六百多名中外方代表与会。

source: State Counselor of Myanmar Aung San Suu Kyi, Deputy Secretary of the Russian Federation's General Committee Reznianek, Treasurer of the U.S. National Republican Committee Anthony Parker,
reference: 缅甸国务资政昂山素季，俄罗斯统一俄罗斯党总委员会主席团副书记热列兹尼亚克，美国共和党全国委员会司库安东尼帕克。

source: and Vice President of Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front and Deputy Prime Minister of the government Demeke respectively addressed the plenary session and spoke highly of Xi Jinping's proposal to build a community with a shared future for mankind
reference: 埃塞俄比亚人民革命民主阵线副主席、政府副总理德梅克在全体会议上分别致辞，高度评价习近平关于构建人类命运共同体

source: The pragmatic cooperation in all fields has made positive progress, and the relations between our two countries have maintained a healthy momentum of sound and steady development.
reference: 各领域务实合作取得积极进展，两国关系保持健康稳定发展的良好势头。

source: We are willing to work with Myanmar to firmly grasp the correct direction for the development of bilateral relations and implement all consensuses reached by both sides,
reference: 我们愿同缅方一道，牢牢把握中缅关系发展正确方向，落实好双方达成的各项共识。

source: actively explore new points of growth for cooperation in building the economic corridor between China and Myanmar, and promote the sound and rapid development of bilateral relations
reference: 积极探讨建设中缅经济走廊等新的合作增长点，推动中缅关系又好又快发展

source: Xi Jinping said that the 19th National Congress held in October this year is of great strategic significance to China.
reference: 习近平表示，今年十月召开的中共十九大对中国具有重大战略意义。

source: The Congress summed up all the work since the 18th CPC National Congress.
reference: 大会总结了中共十八大以来的各项工作。

source: It also regarded constructing a community with a shared future for mankind as a new direction of China's diplomatic efforts.
reference: 并将构建人类命运共同体作为新时代中国外交努力方向。

source: At present, relations between China and Cambodia are at their best in history.
reference: 当前，中柬关系处于历史最好时期

source: Mutual political trust between the two countries has been continually enhanced, practical cooperation has continued to expand, and humanistic exchanges have become increasingly closer, which has brought tangible benefits to both peoples.
reference: 双方政治互信不断增强，务实合作持续扩大，人文交流日益密切，为两国人民带来了实实在在的利益。

source: Next year marks the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Cambodia, and we hope both sides will take this opportunity to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries to push forward the in-depth development of bilateral relations and long-term stability.
reference: 明年是中柬建交六十周年，希望双方以庆祝两国建交六十周年为契机，推动两国关系深入发展、行稳致远。

source: Cambodia has always given China strong support.
reference: 柬方始终给予中方坚定支持

source: China has always supported Cambodia in taking a development path that matches its own national conditions and supported the Cambodian government's efforts
reference: 中方一贯支持柬埔寨走符合本国国情的发展道路， 支持柬政府

source: China is ready to work with Cambodia to actively expand strategic cooperation between the two countries and fully utilize the politically leading role of exchange between the two parties in relations between the two countries,
reference: 中方愿同柬方一道，积极拓展两国战略合作，发挥两党交往对两国关系的政治引领作用。

source: Hun Sen extended warm congratulations to Xi Jinping for winning the support of the entire party and the people throughout the country and for being reelected as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.
reference: 洪森对习近平得到全党全国人民拥护、再次当选中共中央总书记表示热烈祝贺。

source: and continue to improve our own ability and level of governance
reference: 不断提升自身执政能力和水平

source: On the 29th of November local time, Premier Li Keqiang of the State Council met with Russian President Vladimir Putin in the Kremlin in Moscow.
reference: 国务院总理李克强当地时间十一月二十九号 ，在莫斯科克里姆林宫会见俄罗斯总统普京。

source: Li Keqiang first conveyed President Xi Jinping's sincere greetings and good wishes to President Putin.
reference: 李克强首先转达了习近平主席对普京总统的诚挚问候和良好祝愿。

source: Li Keqiang said that President Xi Jinping met with Putin in a successful meeting in Da Nang, Vietnam, shortly after the closing ceremony of the 19th CCP National Congress.
reference: 李克强表示，中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会闭幕后不久，习近平主席同普京总统在越南岘港成功会晤。

source: Li Keqiang pointed out that at present, the economic cooperation between the two countries is taking solid steps. Cooperation in traditional areas has been continuously pushed forward and cooperation in new areas also made progress.
reference: 李克强指出，当前两国经济合作正迈出坚实步伐，传统领域合作持续推进，新领域合作也取得进展。

source: Li Keqiang stressed that China is ready to step up its communication and coordination with Russia in international affairs.
reference: 李克强强调，中方愿同俄方加强在国际事务中的沟通协调。

source: and work to inject constructive force into the peaceful development of the world.
reference: 为世界的和平发展注入建设性力量

source: He expressed that
reference: 他表示

source: at present, the trade between Russia and China has enjoyed good growth momentum and that cooperation in energy, transport infrastructure, agriculture and local areas has been actively promoted.
reference: 当前俄中贸易增长势头良好，能源、交通基础设施、农业、地方等领域合作积极推进。

source: The Eurasian Economic Union and the Belt and Road Initiative are complementary.
reference: 欧亚经济联盟和一带一路倡议具有互补性。

source: to attend the 16th Prime Ministerial Meeting of SCO Member Countries. Senior officials of the Russian government and the Chinese ambassador in Russia, Li Hui, welcomed him at the airport.
reference: 出席上海合作组织成员国总理第十六次会议， 俄罗斯政府高级官员和中国驻俄罗斯大使李辉等在机场迎接。

source: On the afternoon of November 30th local time, Premier Li Keqiang met with Tajikistan Prime Minister Rasulzoda, Pakistani Prime Minister Abbasi and Uzbekistan Prime Minister Aripov in their hotel in Sochi.
reference: 当地时间十一月三十号下午，国务院总理李克强在索契下榻饭店会见塔吉克斯坦总理拉苏尔佐达，巴基斯坦总理阿巴西，乌兹别克斯坦总理阿里波夫。

source: Rasulzoda said that China is welcome to continue to participate in power development, natural gas pipelines, transport facilities, and other important projects of Tajikistan.
reference: 拉苏尔佐达表示，欢迎中方继续参与塔电力开发、天然气管道、交通设施等重要项目。

source: When meeting with Abbasi, Li Keqiang said that China willl uphold its high level of political sincerity, explore the construction of a free trade area with Pakistan,
reference: 在会见阿巴西时李克强表示 ，中方愿秉持高度的政治诚意，同巴方探讨自贸区建设

source: China is ready to continue its cooperation in security and defense with Pakistan and make contributions to regional peace and stability.
reference: 中方愿同巴方继续开展安全防务合作， 为地区和平稳定做出贡献。

source: Abbasi said that the at present, the economic corridor construction in Pakistan and China is proceeding smoothly.
reference: 阿巴西表示，当前巴中经济走廊建设进展顺利。

source: When meeting with Aripov, Li Keqiang said President Xi Jinping held a meeting with President Mirziyoyev, who has visited China in May of this year.
reference: 在会见阿里波夫时李克强表示，习近平主席同今年五月访华的米尔济约耶夫总统举行会晤。

source: Uzbekistan is ready to make joint efforts with China to strengthen cooperation in transportation facilities, hydropower, and other fields so as to promote the all-round development of bilateral relations and cooperation.
reference: 乌方愿同中方共同努力，加强交通设施、水电等领域合作，推动两国关系与合作全面发展。

source: The decisions on the Provisional Regulations will be implemented from the date of its promulgation.
reference: 暂行条例的决定， 自公布之日起施行。

source: and delivered a congratulatory speech on behalf of the CPC Central Committee.
reference: 并代表中共中央致贺词

source: The congratulatory speech pointed out that since the 18th CPC National Congress, the party and the country have made historic achievements, and historic changes have taken place.
reference: 贺词指出， 中共十八大以来，党和国家事业取得了历史性成就、 发生了历史性变革。

source: and make new contributions to implementation of the strategy of rejuvenating the country through science and education, the strategy of strengthening the country by employing qualified personnel and the strategy of innovation-driven development,
reference: 为实施科教兴国战略、人才强国战略、创新驱动发展战略等作出新贡献。

source: accurately grasp the requirements of building socialist participating parties with Chinese characteristics, earnestly perform the functions of participating in politics and discussing politics, supervising democratically and participating in the political consultation under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.
reference: 准确把握建设中国特色社会主义参政党的要求，切实履行好参政议政、民主监督、参加中国共产党领导的政治协商职能。

source: and promote a new level of self-building.
reference: 推进自身建设迈上新台阶

source: Shanghai introduced preferential policies

source: In the first three quarters of this year, the value of smart manufacturing reached nearly 16 billion yuan, an increase of nearly 40% over the same period last year. Our original business was

source: Li Keqiang made positive comments on the development of Sino-Canadian relations over the past year

source: Zhang Dejiang, president of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, attended the 4th National Constitution Day Symposium and delivered a speech on the 4th.
reference: 全国人大常委会委员长张德江四号出席第四个国家宪法日座谈会并讲话

source: He emphasized that we need to regard the study and implementation of the socialist ideology with Chinese characteristics in a new era of Xi Jinping
reference: 他强调，要把深入学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

source: as the most important task in studying and implementing the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress. It is important to comprehensively implement the major decision making and deployment on strengthening the implementation and supervision of the constitution under the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core.
reference: 作为学习贯彻党的十九大精神的重中之重，全面贯彻落实以习近平同志为核心的党中央关于加强宪法实施和监督的重大决策部署

source: It is the concentrated expression of the will of the party and the people. To vigorously carry forward the spirit of the Constitution and fully implement the Constitution, we must unswervingly adhere to the leadership of the CPC,

source: firmly maintain the central position of General Secretary Xi Jinping, firmly safeguard the authority of the Party Central Committee and centralize and unify the leadership, unswervingly uphold socialism with Chinese characteristics,
reference: 坚定维护习近平总书记的核心地位，坚定维护党中央权威和集中统一领导，坚定不移坚持中国特色社会主义

source: Zhang Dejiang emphasized that conducting in-depth publicity and education on the Constitution is important fundamental work for comprehensively promoting the administration of the country according to the law and is also a long-term task that needs constant effort.

source: We should continue to play the important role of performing the activities on National Constitution Day and pledge allegiance to the Constitution, carry out publicity and education on the Constitution by using the methods loved by the masses,
reference: 要继续发挥好国家宪法日活动、宪法宣誓等重要抓手的作用，更多采用人民群众喜闻乐见的方式

source: to establish constitutional awareness and enhance their confidence in the Constitution. They will become firm believers, preachers, practitioners, and defenders of the Constitution.

source: We will promote the further study and implementation of the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the Party and Xi Jinping's thoughts on socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era, inspire and encourage all cadres and masses

source: to promote great practice with great spirit, never forget their initial mission, keep their mission firmly in mind, and make unremitting efforts to achieve the tasks put forward by the 19th National Congress.

source: and the spirit of struggle and dedication it carries are the spiritual impetus to our party's tenacious struggle and continuous development and growth. It is also a valuable spiritual asset for our party to establish and govern and rejuvenate the country.

source: Make great efforts on learning and mastering.

source: The Notice points out that studying and implementing Xi Jinping's socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era is a major political task of the entire party and army for the present and future.

source: and second volume of Xi Jinping: The Governance of China, published previously as the authoritative books in the profound study and understanding of Xi Jinping's socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era, and the spirit of the 19th National Congress,
